data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Dumyat, Egypt to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dumyat, Egypt
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 47,865 believers find a person of peace today among the 1,028,234 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Dumyat.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Dumyat, Egypt. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Arab, Sudanese people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Dumyat, Egypt by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Dumyat who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Dumyat, Egypt to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.
